string-array.name: listTOS
string-array.item: 1. Child Pornography is strictly prohibited. Have a Soul!!
2. We don\'t sell your personal Data in exchange for money.We are ambitious, not greedy.
3. Reveal your personal information to any one at your own risk.
4. We dont save your messages on our servers.We dont have that kind of cash buddy.Even if we had, we wouldn\'t.
5. Beware of those business proposals offering millions of cash in diplomatic Suitcases. They are all Frauds. Use some brains my friend!!
6. This is a tool to communicate, socialise and make friends. Dont use it to conspire, bully or harass.Any misuse will result in account suspension.
Thats it. Lets get going!! Hurrah!!!!!
